title: Animal Welfare Expedition: Mathematics Education Utilizing Biomimetic Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Program for naturally acquiring animal welfare concepts through mathematical problem-solving, with gamification elements to enhance learning motivation

learning_goals: Learners analyze animal habitat data to prepare a welfare metric calculation sheet with at least 80% accuracy
Learners sequentially complete gamification stages (Level 1–4), improving their problem-solving rate for animal welfare math questions from 75% to 95%
Learners propose at least three actionable strategies linking animal welfare practices to mathematical decision-making in a role-based reward market activity
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
